message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $9500. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a lower price of $8000 to reflect its worth to me.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to consider my costs as well. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $9000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to counteroffer at $8500.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to ensure I'm fairly compensated for the product. I'm counteroffering at $9250. This is as low as I can go, considering the value I place on the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value you see in the product, and I would like to propose a final counteroffer at $8750.

I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. I'll make one last offer. I'm counteroffering at $9000, but I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a free maintenance package and a 5-year warranty. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
I appreciate the additional offers, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product and the added benefits, I would like to counteroffer at $8875.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'll make one last push. I'm counteroffering at $9100. I'll include the same extras as before, and I'll even throw in a 2-year extended warranty. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
Thank you for your continued efforts, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product and the additional benefits, I would like to make my final counteroffer at $8900.
